4601daa2a848.title: It’s kinda what happens in a culture where anything and everything has become a giant “bazaar”.

paragraphs.text: It’s kinda what happens in a culture where anything and everything has become a giant “bazaar”. Though apparently it’s not really the ‘marketing’ part you object to… you just want the products and ‘reasons’ to be a bit more “high-minded” (like yours)?! ;-)
paragraphs.name: d484

3a4a3d705da0.title: Just wrote an article about this last week, we are on the same page, friend.

paragraphs.text: Just wrote an article about this last week, we are on the same page, friend. There is a huge problem with the way internet marketing is being done. I’m actually using clickbait titles to sneak in life lessons and snarky nonfiction because at least it’s more valuable than some webinar that won’t help you and won’t solve anything. At least in beauty or truth, consumers can find knowledge or joy.
paragraphs.name: f5f9

1a123d51dbcb.title: So I’m just back home (Wisconsin) from Las Vegas.

content.subtitle: You can only take strangers invading your space for so long. You say no thanks and they keep talking, try to ignore them and they yell…

virtuals.subtitle: You can only take strangers invading your space for so long. You say no thanks and they keep talking, try to ignore them and they yell…

paragraphs.text: So I’m just back home (Wisconsin) from Las Vegas. Walking around the Strip or downtown Vegas is a lot like many websites, every ten feet someone is calling out to you, or trying to give you a sample of something smelly or snapping a desk of cards to get your attention and then jamming one in your face. I’m walking hand-in-hand with my wife; what…
paragraphs.name: b2d6

content.subtitle: Learning new writing techniques, brushing up on grammar and forging relationships with other writers should not be the domain of the…

virtuals.subtitle: Learning new writing techniques, brushing up on grammar and forging relationships with other writers should not be the domain of the…

paragraphs.text: This is a great idea. I’ve been doing something similar with my blog — teaching people how to write more effectively and selling my own services that will add actual value to the writing community. Definitely not a get rich quick scheme, but I’m at least able to cut back hours at my sh*tty j-o-b.
paragraphs.name: b89d

virtuals.subtitle: It’s a lot more approachable with that kind of high-level mindset.

paragraphs.text: At some point I shifted in thinking of marketing as “sell as much of this thing as possible” to thinking of marketing as “How can I best publicize the virtues, uses, and value of any thing?”

paragraphs.text: It’s a lot more approachable with that kind of high-level mindset.

9ea4e5541b42.title: Well, you did suck me in, and I do agree with you that we’re all being “slam bammed” by all this…

paragraphs.text: Well, you did suck me in, and I do agree with you that we’re all being “slam bammed” by all this marketing shit. My Inbox is full of stupid propositions. It’s unfortunate that, as writers, we have to participate in order to sell books or, in your case, writing programs. Good luck in your venture.

content.subtitle: I am sick of being sold to. And by extension, I’m dead sick of selling.

virtuals.subtitle: I am sick of being sold to. And by extension, I’m dead sick of selling.

5cb388e8cf4a.title: I too have been experiencing a revulsion towards internet marketing, at the same time as wanting to…

content.subtitle: Speaking personally, I think the road to ruin starts with wanting success to come fast, and believing the internet marketer hype around…

virtuals.subtitle: Speaking personally, I think the road to ruin starts with wanting success to come fast, and believing the internet marketer hype around…

paragraphs.text: I too have been experiencing a revulsion towards internet marketing, at the same time as wanting to use the internet to market my business. The conclusion I’ve reached is that internet marketing is not inherently bad, it is just a tool. There is hope for us too: internet consumers are getting more internet-savvy, and more discerning, all the time.
paragraphs.name: f1d3

d415956deb14.description: Home to some of the best stories on medium. Look around, relax and enjoy one with a sip of coffee.
d415956deb14.shortDescription: Home to some of the best stories on medium.
d415956deb14.name: The Coffeelicious

paragraphs.text: If someone can’t afford $499? Well, they’re not trying hard enough. Or they don’t want it badly enough. Or they’re not manifesting with enough intensity. They aren’t using the Law of Attraction properly.

Maybe there are people who aren’t tired of being sold to, or who aren’t sick of selling. Maybe the old model still works for some people. I don’t know. What I do know is that I want to find a different way.
paragraphs.name: 8fd7

paragraphs.text: Here’s what I want to do: I want to teach people how to write their stories. And I want to write my own stories for people to read.
paragraphs.name: e489
